content:
The https://docs.backdropcms.org/api/backdrop/core%21modules%21layout%21includes%21block_legacy.class.inc/class/BlockLegacy/1 page states:

@file Class that wraps around legacy hook_block_view/config/save() hooks.

Does that mean that functions like on https://docs.backdropcms.org/api/backdrop/core%21modules%21layout%21includes%21block_legacy.class.inc/function/BlockLegacy::form/1 are just to maintain compatibility with the old Drupal 7 style and that when developing new Backdrop code, we should avoid using them? Will legacy functions be deprecated in the future?
